UserProfile.Name: 16 to 18
UserProfile.Description:
If you are aged 16-18, you are entitled to child rate travel with a valid 16-18 card.
You must be under 18 on 1st September 2020 and, your parents must pay Council Tax to one of the following Metropolitan Councils - Birmingham, Dudley, Sandwell, Walsall, Wolverhampton, Solihull or Coventry.
16-18 photocards can be used to buy child rate single, return and daysaver tickets. Term Plus passes are also available to 16-18 year olds with a photocard, who are in full-time education or undertaking an apprenticeship/trainee placement.

UserProfile.Description: Up to three children under 5 years of age, accompanied by a fare paying adult or child passenger, and not occupying a seat, may travel free of charge on the Company 5day's services.
